sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>ais_country_to_search_language</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Add Warning Message</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var WARNING_THRESHOLD = 3; var multilingualGa = new GlideAggregate("ais_country_to_search_language"); multilingualGa.addAggregate('COUNT', 'country'); multilingualGa.addQuery('country', current.country); multilingualGa.query(); if (multilingualGa.next()) { var row_count = multilingualGa.getAggregate('COUNT', 'country'); if (row_count >= WARNING_THRESHOLD) { gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("'{0}' has {1} country to language mappings. Mapping multiple search languages to a single country expands the search scope for each query. Test to make sure your mappings don't impact performance for the search experience.", [current.country.name, row_count])); } } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-03-13 02:36:00</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>27dcf5e94fe9e110d8699bcc32ce0b39</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Add Warning Message</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_27dcf5e94fe9e110d8699bcc32ce0b39</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-03-13 02:53:44</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=27dcf5e94fe9e110d8699bcc32ce0b39"/> </record_update>
